General.Name: RCF Acquisition Corp
General.Description: RCF Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses to target assets or businesses of scale across the critical minerals value chain that are poised to benefit over the long-term from the substantial market opportunity created by the global energy transition. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Denver, Colorado.
General.Address: 1400 Sixteenth Street, Denver, CO, United States, 80202
